search.query: index=logiq host=$hosttok2$ sourcetype=config_xml NOT !|rex field=_raw "^(?P<Config_Tag>[^\t >]+)[\t ]*(?P<Config_Attrib>[^>]*)>(?P<Config_Value>[^<]*)"|append [search index=logiq host=$hosttok1$ sourcetype=config_xml NOT !|rex field=_raw "^(?P<Config_Tag2>[^\t >]+)[\t ]*(?P<Config_Attrib2>[^>]*)>(?P<Config_Value2>[^<]*)"]|eval config1=Config_Tag." - ".Config_Value." - ".Config_Attrib|eval config2=Config_Tag2." - ".Config_Value2." - ".Config_Attrib2| eval Settings=coalesce(config1, config2) |search $tagtok$|sort - Settings|table host,Settings

index=logiq host=$hosttok1$ sourcetype=config_xml NOT !|rex field=_raw "^(?P<Config_Tag>[^\t >]+)[\t ]*(?P<Config_Attrib>[^>]*)>(?P<Config_Value>[^<]*)"|append [search index=logiq host=$hosttok2$ sourcetype=config_xml NOT !|rex field=_raw "^(?P<Config_Tag2>[^\t >]+)[\t ]*(?P<Config_Attrib2>[^>]*)>(?P<Config_Value2>[^<]*)"]|eval config1=Config_Tag." - ".Config_Value." - ".Config_Attrib|eval config2=Config_Tag2." - ".Config_Value2." - ".Config_Attrib2|eval Settings=coalesce(config1, config2) |sort - Settings|search $tagtok$|stats count values(Settings) by Settings|where count=1|sort - Settings|table Settings
